CENTURO GLOBAL BATTLEGROUND
The Ultimate New startup Pitching Competition
£100,000
Oct 2019
London, UK
 
We are excited to announce that the next Centuro Global Battleground Final will take place at the Centuro Global Annual Conference in October 2019.
HOW DOES IT WORK?
 
Round 1
Selection
All applicants must submit a business plan. Applicants will then initially be narrowed down to 20 successful competitors who will enter the London arena in September 2019 and face a panel of pre-eminent judges.

Ahead of this qualifying round, each competitor will be assigned a mentor and receive a coaching session to help them prepare.
Round 2
Play-offs
There will be multiple rounds of 60 seconds each, where each competitor will present on different areas of their business plan. The judges will then select their top 3 startups to progress to the Live Final in October 2019.

The pitches will be filmed and shared on social media, providing competitors with further marketing opportunities.
Round 3
Live Final
The 3 finalists will pitch again in the ring in front of a live audience, where one lucky winner will secure the £100,000 prize to inject into their business.
 
STEPS TO APPLY
If you are a member of the Centuro Global Business Hub, please submit your business plan to your Centuro Global contact. If you are not currently a member, you can complete your registration through Eventbrite
 
Once registration is complete and we have received confirmation
We will send an email requesting further information including a detailed business plan for our panel to review.
The business plan should include information on your business model, the market opportunity, the team, competitors, and financials.
Applications from all sectors and countries welcome.
If you have the mettle to get in the ring and face our panel apply now !
Closing date: 23 August 2019
